enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: RTC 1 Hz clock drives RTC CLKOUT

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: RTC 32 kHz oscillator drives RTC CLKOUT

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: All off-chip accesses (op code and data) via the FlexBus are disallowed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: Off-chip op code accesses are disallowed. Data accesses are allowed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Off-chip op code accesses and data accesses are allowed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Single-pad drive strength for CMT IRO or UART0_TXD

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Dual-pad drive strength for CMT IRO or UART0_TXD

field.name: FTM1CH0SRC
field.description: FlexTimer 1 channel 0 input capture source select

field.name: FTM2CH0SRC
field.description: FlexTimer 2 channel 0 input capture source select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0 external clock driven by FTM CLKIN0 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0 external clock driven by FTM CLKIN1 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM1 external clock driven by FTM CLKIN0 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM1 external clock driven by FTM CLKIN1 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM2 external clock driven by FTM CLKIN0 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM2 external clock driven by FTM CLKIN1 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3 external clock driven by FTM CLKIN0 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM3 external clock driven by FTM CLKIN1 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: CMP0 OUT drives FTM0 hardware trigger 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM1 channel match trigger drives FTM0 hardware trigger 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: PDB output trigger 1 drives FTM0 hardware trigger 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM2 channel match trigger drives FTM0 hardware trigger 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: CMP3 OUT drives FTM3 hardware trigger 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM1 channel match trigger drives FTM3 hardware trigger 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: PDB output trigger 3 drives FTM3 hardware trigger 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM2 channel match trigger drives FTM3 hardware trigger 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: UART0_TX pin modulated with FTM1 channel 0 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: UART0_TX pin modulated with FTM2 channel 0 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: UART1_TX pin modulated with FTM1 channel 0 Output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: UART1_TX pin modulated with FTM2 channel 0 Output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Provides two seperated minor loop, loop for ADC0/1 and loop for ADC2/3D

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Provides a loop to involve ADC0, ADC1, ADC2 and ADC3

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Internal generated 60MHz ULPI clock is not output to the ULPI_CLK pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Interanl generated 60MHz ULPI clock provide clock for external ULPI phy
